channel.title: Advertising Help
channel.description: Hi I'm wanting to make a thing where is someone is advertising a website it will say like no advertising you can 3 warnings left and then it permanently mutes them after the 3 warnings if anyone can help me id really appreciate it.

item.title: Advertising Help
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]@Dan; Reached end of file while parsing means it’s missing a bracket, not it has an extra.

@DannyBoy; This is the server help, yes. Though we have helped you! You’re just not helping yourself. This isn’t a spoon-feeding community.[/quote]
Always get the 100 errors/reached end while parsing muddled up.

Read full topic

item.title: Advertising Help
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

DannyBoy1995:

lol the reason this site has a server help topic is for people to post there problems and people will help you fix it and im trying to fix this and i cant and kid quit saying incompetent because you dont even know what the word means so if you cant help me stop posting on my topic.

Incompetent means you are un-able to do something for yourself. And when you agreed to the terms before joining the forum you should of read that this is not a spoonfeeding community, which means help your god-damn-fucking-self before just expecting help from the community.

Learn some respect.

Read full topic

item.title: Advertising Help
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Quote from my inbox:

[quote=“DannyBoy1995”]src\server\Connection.java:317: reached end of file while parsing
}→
^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .
if you can explain how to fix it please[/quote]

Mendorphins:

Line 317 in your Connection class you have an extra } that you do not need.

I gave you a fucking answer you little shit. I also suggested ways in my post of not making yourself look like such an incompetent, lazy, half-assed prick before posting help topics, but you obviously couldn’t comprehend that.

You may be new but that doesn’t mean you can be a lazy. Perfect constructive critism.

Read full topic

item.title: Advertising Help
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:17, topic:387571”]Don’t just PM me assuming I know or even will help, and don’t demand help. You should take the time to learn these very basic things.

You could also search similar errors on Google and see how others solved their problem.

Plus, I think you’re just posting every error you’re getting without looking at it yourself first. I don’t think these kind people should help you anymore until you help yourself.[/quote]
lol ive had this error for a long time ive been trying to fix it for a while and cant so dont post here if you cant help i asked for help not to hear you bitch about me messaging you, don’t make a big deal out of me messaging you ill do it anytime i want so quit crying like a little 13 year old kid and grow up.

Read full topic

item.title: Advertising Help
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Don’t just PM me assuming I know or even will help, and don’t demand help. You should take the time to learn these very basic things.

You could also search similar errors on Google and see how others solved their problem.

Plus, I think you’re just posting every error you’re getting without looking at it yourself first. I don’t think these kind people should help you anymore until you help yourself.

Read full topic
